info: Rating, 5 stars,  Â· December 2023,  Â· Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
A Perfect Oasis - 5 Stars!
â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸
I recently had the pleasure of staying at this incredible Airbnb, and I cannot express how delightful my experience was. From the moment I crossed the threshold, I was captivated by the tasteful and stylish decor that graced every corner of the space
The attention to detail in the decor was impeccable, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The cleanliness of the space was exceptional, making me feel comfortable and at ease throughout my entire stay. The host's commitment to maintaining a pristine environment truly set the standard for a five-star experience.
The amenities provided were not only plentiful but also of top-notch quality. The kitchen was well-equipped, allowing me to prepare meals with ease. The cosy bed and plush linens ensured a restful night's sleep, making it difficult to leave the comfort of the room each morning.
Location-wise, this Airbnb is a dream. I was able to explore the area effortlessly.
Thank you, Mr. Masum.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  Â· November 2023,  Â· Stayed with kids
rating_comment: The venue proves to be an exceptional choice for family gatherings, boasting delightful views through its expansive windows. Gratitude is extended to Masum and his family for their gracious hospitality and integral role in ensuring a memorable experience.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  Â· August 2023
rating_comment: Comfortable. No clearly defined rubbish service was a bit of a problem. The space is large, modern and comfortable and will easily accommodate 4 or 5 without any issues. Bathrooms are modern and clean. local shops and markets nearby. The elevator to the apartment is not air conditioned. Cutlery and crockery is limited. Cooking utensils are very limited so communicate with the owner if you intend to be doing any cooking. The fridge is large and modern. lots of natural light and excellent lighting options inside. Beautiful little balcony to enjoy the view.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  Â· April 2022,  Â· Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
This is one of the best airbnbs I have ever stayed!
The host is amazing, very proactive, responsive and warm, he was very generous adjusting something according my requirements, super thanks for that.
The apartment is prettier than picture, incredibly well designed, nicely decorated and clean and tidy. Perfect home away from home.
Location is quiet, secured and nice. However, there aren't many great restaurants nearby (maybe I didn't find), though Gulshan, Banani area is very close to it. The supershop and the two restaurants next the building are okay :)
I, certainly would love to stay in this apartment again :)
Thanks a lot Masum, for letting me stay in your beautiful apartment. :)

info: Rating, 5 stars,  Â· March 2022,  Â· Stayed over a week
rating_comment: The pictures on this property property is exactly what you receive nice clean house plenty of room modern style. The host was very accommodating to all my needs. They even provided a daily housekeeper that came and cleaned the house which was very useful for me as I was stay there as a bachelor. Security guards and the entrance of the development security guards at the bottom of the elevator. Very secured very private plenty of activity . There was even an area for groceries and restaurants that will deliver to your home . Full kitchen everything is available had a great time staying there hopefully I could stay there again on my next trip
